data.title: St. Louis AAA Blues
data.text:
"Quest for the cup"...Signed Matthew Tkachuk Game Jersey - WINNER --- Matt Hrubes

CONGRATULATIONS to Matt Hrubes!!!

He was the lucky winner of the signed Stanley Cup Champion & AAA Blues alum jersey raffle of Matthew Tkachuk. A HUGE thank you to everyone for there participation.

___________________________________________

Now is your chance to enter our raffle to win a signed Florida Panthers jersey from our very own AAA Blues alum - Matthew Tkachuk. Matthew and the Florida Panthers face off against the Edmonton Oilers as they battle it out for one of the oldest trophies in professional sports.

Matthew played his youth hockey for the AAA Blues and was one of 5 AAA Blues alumni that moved on to NHL postseason and the quest for the cup. The other four notable alumni in the post season include Patrick Maroon, Scott Mayfield, Trent Frederic, and Joseph Woll.

Please click on the below link for your chance to enter and win this signed jersey. Chances (raffle tickets) are $20 a piece or 6 for $100. All proceeds (100%) will be used in support of our entire club and we thank you for participating - GOOD LUCK!!!

https://my.onecause.com/event/organizations/cb413d1f-ea0b-4ccc-be95-d223c3eadda1/events/vevt:79c3bde7-cf71-494e-b74c-cfbe5f322333/shop/raffle

We will officially close the raffle the following day at 5pm central after the winner is crowned and they hoist. We will connect with the lucky winner to share the jersey and announce on our website!!

Thank you for supporting the St. Louis AAA Blues!!

Head coaching announcements for the 2024-2025 season!!!

The St. Louis AAA Blues are proud to announce our Head Coaches for the upcoming season and the addition of two new birthyears to our lineup.

Again we will have one of the deepest and most knowledgeable coaching staffs across the board and couldn't be more excited for our veteran group.

Also, with the addition of Squirt Minor (9U) and Squirt Major (10U) this coming season, we will be fielding 13 teams to compete at the Tier 1 Level.

HEAD COACHES (we will be building out staffs for all teams in the upcoming weeks)

MIDGET PROGRAM

18U: Jeff Brown

16U: Sam Canfield

15U: Nick Carey

BOYS PROGRAM

14U (2010): John Gilbert

13U (2011): Stephen Bopp

12U (2012): Jamal Mayers

11U (2013): Bill Ravensberg

10U (2014): Eric Ormson

9U (2015): Jordy Fox

GIRLS PROGRAM

19U: Connor Chatham

16U: Connor Chatham

14U: Cole Chatham

12U: Charles Blyth

*** Tryouts for ALL teams will start the week of May 15th.

Please check back in April for more information!!!!

Read more

7 State Champions & 8 Teams moving on to Central District qualifiers!!

Wow, what a weekend of hockey and lots of congratulations are in order!! Thank you to all the players, families, alumni and friends that spent time at the rink the last 3 days cheering on ALL our teams.

This was a very special time winning ALL 7 of the boys divisions that compete in Tier 1 hockey!!

Our 2012s and 2011s started the week off with Tier One Cup victories as part of the BlueNote cup on Sunday. The 2012s wrapped up their season with a 6-3 victory in the final, followed by the 2011s with a 9-0 victory. Both teams were crowned as State Champions and as non national bound teams ended their season ranked #18 (2012) and #16 (2011) in the country respectfully.

Our 5 national bound teams also had success with our 2010s, 2009s, U15 and U16 sweeping the best of 3 series in 2 games. The U18s won the decisive game three 5-4 with a come from behind overtime victory (twice) to secure the 7th and final state championship for our club.

All 5 of these teams are moving on to Central Districts March 15-17 in Des Moines, Iowa.

On the girls side, our U14, U16, U19 wrapped up there travel season and are also busy getting ready for their Central District run that will take place March 15-17 in Fond du Lac, Wisconsin. Very exciting time for all 8 teams as they work on taking the next step and the chance to move on to Nationals.

Best of luck to everyone and Lets Go Blues.....
